short_summary: Request for Proposals for Technical Translation Services for Department of National Defence (DND) requirements.
description: The statement of requirement is for establishing a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) to provide
full_summary:
```markdown
# Technical Translation Services, Ontario

## Solicitation Number

* Solicitation Number: OR22SOA1-79141
* Reference Number: PW-22-01016894
* Amendment Number: 0

## Tender Information

* Tender Closing Date: January 31, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired

## Description

The Department of Defence Construction Canada is seeking qualified consulting firms to provide technical translation services on a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) basis. The services will be required to translate various technical documents for the Department of National Defence at several Canadian Base locations.

The SOA will be for a one year period with a maximum estimated value of $400,000.00. The anticipated call-ups under the SOA are expected to be valued between $1,000.00 to $40,000.00.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

## Services Required

* Technical translation services for technical documents
* Translation services for Department of National Defence requirements
* Linguistic translation services for various languages

## Qualification Criteria

Only consulting firms with relevant experience and expertise are eligible to submit their abbreviated proposals.

## Submission Instructions

To submit their proposals, interested consulting firms should access the MERX Electronic Bidding System.

## Contract Award Information

The contract award results can be accessed on the Defence Construction Canada website.

### Contact Information

* Name: Mark Smith
* Email: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-859-0549
```markdown
